name: Idle Industries
description:
Idle Industries is a project developed solely by me(Max Tarabbia). Its a factory building sim with several idle game mechanics including a prestige system and offline time resimulation. Start by using miners to get a good base of resources. From there the tutorial will guide you through using belts to transport resources and refineries. Refined materials will have a higher value and are necessary to construct more advanced buildings. After a few dozen hours you'll begin to approach 1 million credits which will then allow you to prestige and start again but this time resources are twice as valuable!

This game features completely original music, and approximately 20 hours of gameplay...but this is an idle game so its all depends on how its played

Options include a few anti-aliasing options, Key maps for basic controls, volume sliders and unlockable skins!

This game is open source as well!

Check out the code on https://github.com/maxtarabbia/IdleFactory
